 Deduction joining two equivalences to form equivalence of implications. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
imbi12d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
imbi12d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
imbi12d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps -> th ) <-> ( ch -> ta ) ) ) $.
